io.parallec.core.actor

Class ExecutionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • io.parallec.core.actor.ExecutionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class ExecutionManager
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    This is the Akka Actor that executes the ParallelTask. Will create a list of operation workers to match each of the target hosts.
    Author:
    Yuanteng (Jeff) Pei
